name: LibJRogueConsole

screenshots.caption: A simple test showing some of the features.
Roguelike rooms made using the libarary.
Text based PONG clone made using the library.

short_description:
LibJRogueLibrary is an extremely lightweight alternative to using a full curses implementation for writing roguelike or other text based console games.

summary: A simple psuedo-console for roguelike games in Java.
